divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking my dog out at slightly after 10PM and was standing on my deck with my porch light on when this VERY VERY bright white object appeared just over the tree tops. It had a red tail almost as long as it was. It moved from left to right horizontally. I had time to say to myself that it was definitely NOT a plane. It was larger by far, and brighter and had no wings. There was NO sound. I watched for about another 15 minutes but nothing furher happened. It was not moving fast enough for a comet or meteor or shooting star, but moved faster than an airplane. I am wondering if there were any other sightings in Londonderry, NH that night.
Summary: Very bright White object with a tail of red (like fire) moving silently over the tree tops in my backyard. Larger than a plane, no wings. Moved rapidly, but not like a meteor, horizontal in sky. 5 to 8 seconds and then disappeared.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Londonderry
There were no other sightings in Londonderry on or around July 13th 2009
